item.title: Gadwal student dies by suicide after losing Rs 1 lakh in online betting
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: A 24-year-old MTech student, Pavan, died by suicide in Attapur after losing heavily on betting apps. The police said he hanged himself at his residence following repeated losses, including Rs 1 lakh in a single bet.
Desperate to recover money, Pavan, who hailed from Gadwal District, sold his iPhone and Royal Enfield bike to continue gambling, even using funds sent by his parents.
Police have registered a case and are investigating.
Many victims of online betting end up in debt afte...]]>
item.author: Newsmeter Network
